title: Sunday drives

abstract: 'We weren't interested in family stories when we were young.'
description: Fiona Tinney delves into the jigsaw of the past, the stories she heard while going on Sunday drives with the family. Even though she was not very interested at the time, these stories, melded with the towns they drove through have imprinted on her memory as Tinney tries to hold on to them.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Title; B2002227; Digital Storytelling project : general public (March 2008); Active; Mar 2008
